string.name: name
string.value: The Owner of the Mysterious Note
There is a note inside the Ant Tunnel. Let's pick it up and see what it is.
You've picked up a Mysterious Note inside the dungeon. Let's return this Note to its owner. Hm, could it belong to Mu Young?

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him. You have given the Note to Mu Young, whom you met inside the dungeon.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's return the piece of paper you've picked up. Could it be Mu Young's?
There is a crumpled piece of paper on the ground. Would you like to pick it up and read what's written on it?

The words written on this piece of paper make absolutely no sense.\r\n#bPrince of Darkness. Underground temple, a bold young man, the key of the seal... My last breath'#k\r\nWhat's that supposed to mean? There is nobody around so finding the owner might be hard. Oh, maybe it belongs to Manji's apprentice, Mu Young.
Hm? What is that? That doesn't belong to me.
Let's go find the owner of this paper.
